newStories.title: Design clarc architecture and stories
newStories.description: Ralph Opus designs the full clarc monorepo architecture: packages structure, clarc setup/new wizards, 1Password backup/sync, skill standardization, CLAUDE.md layering. Output: comprehensive PRD with 10-15 stories covering the full vision.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Define clarc monorepo package structure (ralph, launcher, skills, hooks, etc.)
Design clarc setup wizard flow with all configuration options
Design clarc new wizard with project-type-specific questions
Design 1Password auto-sync: new keys/MCPs trigger backup
Design CLAUDE.md layering: global → tech-template → project
Design skill standardization: structure, testing, templates
Design local-first + iCloud archive + 1Password backup strategy
Output 10-15 stories to prd-json/update.json covering full implementation
Each story has clear acceptance criteria

newStories.title: Skill standardization and testing framework
newStories.description: Skills need consistent structure and tests. Create a skill template, testing framework, and migrate existing skills to standard format. Remove duplicate slash commands - skills are the source of truth.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Define standard skill structure: SKILL.md, workflows/, scripts/
Create skill template generator: clarc skill new <name>
Create skill testing framework (validate structure, test workflows)
Audit existing skills for duplicates with ~/.claude/commands/
Remove redundant slash commands (skills are source of truth)
Add skill tests to pre-commit hook
Document skill standards in docs/skills.md
Typecheck passes

newStories.title: Auto-sync config changes to 1Password
newStories.description: When a new MCP, key, or config is added locally, prompt to sync to 1Password backup. Add this behavior to global CLAUDE.md so all Claude instances know to do it.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add 1Password sync rule to global ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md
Rule: After adding new MCP/key/config, offer to backup to 1Password
Create op://clarc/config-backup vault item structure
clarc backup command: push local configs to 1Password
clarc restore command: pull configs from 1Password to local
Detect config changes and prompt user to sync
Document backup/restore flow in docs/
Typecheck passes
